name: Grappling Time!
description:
Letter Thing:

Sup gamers!

This is grappling time!

A game in which DUH you grapple to... stuff.

The game's idea originates from KARLSON (a game by Dani) (WISHLIST IT NOW).

I made the game so people who like the grappling gun mechanic in Karlson can use this or that they just wanna practice grappling in games.

Whatever the reason, I hope you enjoy!

Stayyyy funky!

Controls:

Movement: WASD & Spacebar

Looking Around: Mouse
